name: Put Your Hands Up
description:
This is the result of a project in Virtual Reality course. It is design to help people that need arm rehabilitation. You will need a virtual reality device to play it.

This project was made by ENSIIE students : Aristide 'GroZ'Yeux' Auphan (code), Basile 'Buddy' Bonicel (tests) and Alan 'Nala' HANAFI (code).
